channel.title: Projects on Bart-Jan Boverhof
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Bart-Jan Boverhof

item.title: Projects
item.description: On this page I will elaborate on some of the major projects in which I have been involved. Only projects since starting my master are listed. For a complete overview of my cv please follow this link Masterthesis Project September 2020 - Present Abstract The approach of using physiological sensors for the assessment of mental workload has gained in popularity in recent years. We utilized three physiological sensors in predicting mental workload, being electroencephalography (EEG), photoplethysmography (PPG) and galvanic skin response (GSR).
